setEffects.4: When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s. This effect will not trigger again during that duration.

flower.name: Entangling Bloom
flower.desc: A lovely amulet made from twisted paper cord. It is said to hold the power to make wishes come true.

plume.name: Shaft of Remembrance
plume.desc: A demon-slaying arrow of a rather ancient make. It seems to have been preserved with great care by someone, even until the present day.

sands.name: Morning Dew's Moment
sands.desc: A bronze pocket watch adorned with twisted paper cord and a bell. Its hands are forever frozen at the dawn of a certain autumn day.

goblet.name: Hopeful Heart
goblet.desc: A special fortune-telling cylindrical object. The mechanism at the bottom allows one to easily remove all unwanted wish sticks.

circlet.name: Capricious Visage
circlet.desc: A well-preserved ceremonial fox mask. A small, enigmatic smile ever graces its lips.
